title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook the spaghetti until al dente.
While the pasta cooks, fry the diced pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheese, and black pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Remove the pan with pancetta from heat and add the hot pasta.
Pour the egg mixture over the pasta and toss quickly, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
ingredients: 800g boneless chicken breasts, cut into chunks
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and 2 tbsp of tikka paste for at least 30 minutes.
Heat butter in a large pan and cook the marinated chicken until golden. Set aside.
In the same pan, sauté onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add remaining tikka paste and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add canned tomatoes and coconut milk, stirring well.
Return the chicken to the pan and simmer for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish loaded with colorful vegetables tossed in a savory sauce.
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, snap peas)
instructions: In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, and vegetable broth.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp.
Pour in the sauce and toss until everything is coated and sauce thickens.
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet elegant pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce on a thin crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Stretch the pizza dough and place it on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
Brush dough lightly with olive oil.
Spread tomato sauce evenly over the dough.
Tear mozzarella into pieces and distribute over the sauce.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden and cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven, top with fresh basil, drizzle with olive oil, and serve hot.

title: Thai Green Curry
summary: A fragrant and spicy coconut curry with vegetables and protein in an aromatic green sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or large pan over medium-high heat.
Add green curry paste and fry for 2-3 minutes.
Pour in half of the coconut milk and stir until combined.
Add sliced chicken and cook until mostly done.
Add bamboo shoots and remaining coconut milk.
Season with fish sauce and brown sugar.
Simmer for 10 minutes until chicken is cooked through.
Add Thai basil and lime juice just before serving.
Serve with jasmine rice.
